attributes.action: abandon plans for ID Cards and a National Identity Register
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Please sign this petition if you would like to see the plans for a national identity database and card dropped, and the legislation permitting it repealed.

There are currently no open petitions against this piece of legislation - the previous one closed 15th February (http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/IDcards/).  Hence I have created this petition to allow people to register their continuing disapproval of the plans.

A petition in favour of ID cards can be found here: 
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/idcard/
